channel.title: CVE Feed for chromiumembedded -- cef
channel.description: The latest CVEs for chromiumembedded -- cef

item.title: CVE-2024-21639|2024-01-12T21:16:06.709Z -- chromiumembedded -- cef
item.description: CEF (Chromium Embedded Framework ) is a simple framework for embedding Chromium-based browsers in other applications. `CefLayeredWindowUpdaterOSR::OnAllocatedSharedMemory` does not check the size of the shared memory, which leads to out-of-bounds read outside the sandbox. This vulnerability was patched in commit 1f55d2e.

item.title: CVE-2024-21640|2024-01-13T07:40:10.324Z -- chromiumembedded -- cef
item.description: Chromium Embedded Framework (CEF) is a simple framework for embedding Chromium-based browsers in other applications.`CefVideoConsumerOSR::OnFrameCaptured` does not check `pixel_format` properly, which leads to out-of-bounds read out of the sandbox. This vulnerability was patched in commit 1f55d2e.
